enhanced_description: Harrison Assessment, established in 1990, is a comprehensive HR technology solution dedicated to optimizing human capital. Utilizing advanced HR and psychological insights, the platform offers trusted employee assessment tools focused on behavioral traits, job-specific customization, and predictive analytics. It empowers managers across the HR spectrum to make smarter, data-driven HR decisions. Harrison Assessment supports the entire talent lifecycle, from acquiring and developing talent to empowering leaders and boosting employee engagement, ultimately enhancing productivity, efficiency, profitability, and organizational success. It streamlines recruitment processes, provides interview guides, identifies factors impacting engagement and retention, and facilitates personalized development plans to unlock peak performance.
